ComicInfo.Summary:
“City at War, Part 4.” As the war for New York reaches a fever pitch, Splinter makes his final gambit for complete victory. Meanwhile, the Turtles are on the run and may not be able to count on each other for survival!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Dave Wachter | 1 | B | Cover B | Kevin Eastman (a) & Tomi Varga (c) | 2 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Sophie Campbell | 3 | 2nd | Second Printing Variant Cover | Dave Wachter | 4 |
